metadata.title: WhichCyp: Prediction of cytochromes P450 inhibition
metadata.abstract: In this work we present WhichCyp, a tool for prediction of which cytochromes P450 isoforms (among 1A2, 2C9, 2C19, 2D6 and 3A4) a given molecule is likely to inhibit. The models are built from experimental high-throughput data using support vector machines and molecular signatures.Availability: The WhichCyp server is freely available for use on the web at http://drug.ku.dk/ whichcyp, where the WhichCyp Java program and source code is also available for download.Contact: Supplementary information: Supplementary data are available at Bioinformatics online. © 2013 The Author 2013. Published by Oxford University Press.

description: Predicts which P450 isoform will bind/metabolize a molecule using simple yes/no classification models.
name: WhichCyp
